title: Chloe Valdary 4: Responding to Jordan Peterson Quotes
description:
Looking at Jordan Peterson's theories via selected quotes from the section in Maps of Meaning on the archetypal Father.

The longer conversation is here and includes Chloe's life story, the genesis of the Theory of Enchantment, discussions of paradox, limitation, creativity and the Barbarian within.

https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytwQ
